reviewText: This is a terrible movie and the DVD quality is also awful.  It's obviously another wide screen film being shown in full screen format by peddlers who have no respect for film or their customers.  Save your money.

reviewText: 01/07/12I received the movie in a timely fashion and in good condition. The movie was just fine. It is now part of my permanent collection.

reviewText: I'd heard so much about this movie over the years, including the link to Magnificent Seven and the Japanese film M S is based on.Disappointment reigned whilst watching.
